code: import React,{useState}from"react";import{useTranslation}from"react-i18next";import CampaignTable from"./components/CampaignTable";import campaignsData from"./data/camp";import{jsx as _jsx,jsxs as _jsxs}from"react/jsx-runtime";const App=()=>{const{t,i18n}=useTranslation();const[campaigns,setCampaigns]=useState(campaignsData);const[language,setLanguage]=useState("en");const changeLanguage=lng=>{setLanguage(lng);i18n.changeLanguage(lng);};const updateCampaign=(id,newDate)=>{setCampaigns(prev=>prev.map(campaign=>campaign.id===id?{...campaign,createdOn:newDate.getTime()}:campaign));};const filterCampaigns=status=>{const now=Date.now();return campaigns.filter(campaign=>status==="upcoming"?campaign.createdOn>now:status==="live"?campaign.createdOn<=now&&campaign.createdOn>now-24*60*60*1000:campaign.createdOn<=now-24*60*60*1000);};return/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("div",{className:"App",children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("h1",{children:t("title")}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("div",{children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("button",{onClick:()=>changeLanguage("en"),children:"English"}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("button",{onClick:()=>changeLanguage("fr"),children:"Fran\xE7ais"})]}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("div",{children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("button",{children:t("upcoming")}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("button",{children:t("live")}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("button",{children:t("past")})]}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(CampaignTable,{campaigns:filterCampaigns("upcoming"),updateCampaign:updateCampaign})]});};export default App;
